thread.title: Watch: Ballad Singer Tim Returns With Absolutely "Beautiful" Single | Soompi
thread.title_full: Watch: Ballad Singer Tim Returns With Absolutely "Beautiful" Single | Soompi

author: E. Kang
title: Watch: Ballad Singer Tim Returns With Absolutely "Beautiful" Single | Soompi
text:
Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Male soloist Tim released his newest single on February 22! 
The singer-songwriter has returned with a self-composed track entitled, “Beautiful,” which talks about how the beauty of being with one’s love is the perfect complement. This Britpop-inspired song came about after about a year’s worth of work and preparation. Tim also collaborated with mastering engineer Chris Gehringer, who’s worked with worldwide artists like Rihanna, Kelly Clarkson, and Shawn Mendes, in the post-production of this track. 
His agency previously explained that Tim will more active with his promotions for this release, and is looking to appear on television more often. The singer debuted back in 2003 with popular hit “I Love You,” and most recently dropped in OST track for JTBC’s “ Fantastic .” 
Give the song a listen below and let us know what you think!
